title: Border Ghost Stories
author: Pease, Howard
snippet: As hewatched and waited there stole down from the fells above him 'oncome' ofmist or 'haar' from the eastward, which soon drew a plaid of hodden greyabove the shoulder of Shillmoor.

title: Border Ghost Stories
